description: Allows the mob to attack the player by summoning other entities.
title: Summon Entity

summon_choices.description: List of spells for the mob to use to summon entities.
summon_choices.title: Summon Choices

cast_duration.description: Time in seconds the spell casting will take.
cast_duration.title: Cast Duration

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the spell again.
cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time

do_casting.description: If true, the mob will do the casting animations and render spell particles.
do_casting.title: Do Casting

max_activation_range.description: Upper bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell.
max_activation_range.title: Maximum Activation Range

min_activation_range.description: Lower bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell.
min_activation_range.title: Minimum Activation Range

particle_color.description: The color of the particles for this spell.
particle_color.title: Particle Color

sequence.description: List of steps for the spell.
sequence.title: Sequence

delay.description: Amount of time in seconds to wait before this step starts.
delay.title: Delay

delay_per_summon.title: Delay Per Summon
delay_per_summon.description: Amount of time in seconds before each entity is summoned in this step.

entity_lifespan.title: Entity Lifespan
entity_lifespan.description: Amount of time in seconds that the spawned entity will be alive for. A value of -1.0 means it will remain alive for as long as it can

base_delay.description: Amount of time in seconds to wait before this step starts.
base_delay.title: Base Delay

entity_type.description: The entity type of the entities we will spawn in this step.
entity_type.title: Entity Type

num_entities_spawned.description: Number of entities that will be spawned in this step.
num_entities_spawned.title: Number Entities Spawned

shape.description: The base shape of this step. Valid values are circle and line
shape.title: Shape

size.description: The base size of the entity.
size.title: Size

sound_event.description: The sound event to play for this step.
sound_event.title: Sound Event

summon_cap.description: Maximum number of summoned entities at any given time.
summon_cap.title: Summon Cap

summon_cap_radius.description: Maximum radius where the summon entities can spawn.
summon_cap_radius.title: Summon Cap Radius

target.description: The target of the spell. This is where the spell will start (line will start here, circle will be centered here)
target.title: Target

start_sound_event.description: The sound event to play when using this spell.
start_sound_event.title: Start Sound Event

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The weight of this spell. Controls how likely the mob is to choose this spell when casting one
